post.description:
Authenticate property for booking engine access. 
      
 The username 
      
 - is the first part of the property's UUID.
      
 The password 
      
 - expires in 5 minutes. 
      
 - should be a base64 encoded timestamp (btoa(Date.now())).

parameters.name: x-booking-engine-key
parameters.description:
Booking Engine Key for accessing this endpoint
      
 How to build it:
      
 - take the property's UUID and split it into two parts using the hyphen (-) as a separator.
      
 - the first part will be the username.
      
 - the second part will be the password.
      
 - concatenate the username and password with a colon (:) in between (e.g., username:password).
      
 - encode the resulting string using base64 encoding.
      
 - use the base64 encoded string as the value for the 'x-booking-engine-key' header.
      
 Example:
      
 - Property UUID: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
      
 - Username: 123e4567
      
 - Password: e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
      
 - Concatenated String: 123e4567:e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000
      
 - Base64 Encoded: MTIzZTQ1Njc6ZTg5Yi0xMmQzLWE0NTYtNDI2NjE0MTc0MDAw

400.description: Bad Request. The request was invalid or cannot be served.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing API key.

403.description: Forbidden. You do not have permission to access this resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource could not be found.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.
